events.title: Wildlife Safari
events.description: Embark on an exciting wildlife safari and observe various exotic animals up close. Join our knowledgeable guides for a memorable adventure!

events.title: Penguin Encounter
events.description: Get up close and personal with adorable penguins in this interactive encounter. Learn about their habits, feed them, and enjoy their playful antics!

events.title: Jungle Night
events.description: Experience the magic of the jungle after dark. Explore the zoo at night, guided by torchlight, and witness nocturnal animals in their natural habitat.

events.title: Zoo Photography Workshop
events.description: Enhance your photography skills in this hands-on workshop. Capture stunning shots of the zoo's diverse animals under the guidance of professional photographers.

events.title: Sloth Appreciation Day
events.description: Celebrate the charm of sloths with a day dedicated to these lovable creatures. Enjoy sloth-themed activities, learn fascinating facts, and meet sloths up close!
